review: almost as good as the original game in some ways better as there is no meat circus but i do prefer the more dark tone of the original voice acting is as great as ever with a fun story and some crazy bosses hunting for some stuff can be annoying but isnt that kind of the point of these collectathon type games like its predecessor as well as titles from around that era like banjo kazooie and donkey kong 64  i hope one day they give us a psychonauts 3
